values: 鞋；马蹄铁；刹车蹄片；插口（电器连接部件）；滑雪板固定器；柱脚；桩靴
给（马等）装蹄铁；为…穿鞋；用金属片加固（或保护）；为（车轮）装轮胎

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 穿鞋的；装有蹄铁的；有金属包头的
为…钉蹄铁（shoe的过去式及过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 运动鞋；运动休闲鞋；活动鞋
(引出建议)要是我处在你的境地, 换了我是你的话
word_group.phrase: if I were in your shoes

word_group.brief_definition: 情况正好相反, 宾主易位
word_group.phrase: the shoe is on the other foot

bilingual.source: Cinderella takes the shoe and reveals the other shoe.
bilingual.target: 灰姑娘拿起鞋子并展示另一只鞋。

bilingual.source: Why have you only got one shoe on?
bilingual.target: 你为什么只穿了一只鞋？

bilingual.source: I asked a lady where the shoe section was.
bilingual.target: 我问了一位女士鞋区在哪里。
穿着拖鞋和跳跃的鞋子。

bilingual.source: Mr Zaid is a customer at my dad's shoe shop.
bilingual.target: 扎伊德先生是我爸爸鞋店的顾客。

bilingual.source: Cinderella runs off stage to the left but loses a shoe.
bilingual.target: 灰姑娘跑下舞台左边但丢了一只鞋。

bilingual.source: I came across stinky tofu, a horrible grey thing that looked and smelt like a burnt sports shoe.
bilingual.target: 我遇到了臭豆腐，一种看起来和闻起来像烧焦运动鞋的灰色东西。

bilingual.source: But just when I thought I could deal with all Chinese food, I came across stinky tofu, a horrible grey thing that looked and smelt like a burnt sports shoe.
bilingual.target: 但就在我以为我能应付所有中国食物时，我遇到了臭豆腐，一个看起来和闻起来像烧焦运动鞋的可怕灰色东西。
运动鞋是一种常见的鞋型。

list.abstract: shoe，英文单词，作名词、动词，释义为鞋、给（马）钉蹄铁等。

yingyinNormal.en: Where's my shoe? It flew off when you crashed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的另一只鞋呢？你坠崖的时候它飞出去了。

yingyinNormal.en: You have a condom stuck to your shoe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你鞋子上沾着一个套套。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy Pig and Peppa are at Miss Rabbit's shoe shop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈和佩奇来到了兔小姐的鞋店。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy Pig and Peppa are at Miss Rabbit's shoe shop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸在兔小姐的鞋店。

yingyinNormal.en: He pooped in my shoe. Which one? Those cute little black ones I wear all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在我鞋里大便。哪只？我常穿的那双可爱黑鞋。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, good. For a minute I thought it might be the shoe police.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错，刚才我还以为是鞋警呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't say… Know any good Gurus? Oh, she got your shoe…
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还别说，认识什么不错的大师吗？她弄湿了你的鞋

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. He pooped in my shoe? Which one? I don't know. The left one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在我的鞋里大便？哪一双？我不知道，左脚。

yingyinNormal.en: It tastes like an old shoe full of jam. Thank you Doctor Brown Bear. Goodbye. Bye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这味道就像一只在里面灌满了果酱的旧鞋。太感谢你了棕熊医生。再见。再见。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, you stay here, and just wait by the phone. Spray Lysol in my shoe, and wait for Ross to kill you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你留在家里等电话，在我鞋内喷“来苏儿”消毒水，顺便等罗斯回来杀你。

yingyinNormal.en: How could you lose him? I don't know. I don't know. We were watching TV, and then he pooped in Monica's shoe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎会把他弄丢了呢？天晓得，我正在看电视，他在莫妮卡的鞋内大便。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, don't you just love it, the crash of the pins, the smell of the rental-shoe spray? Yeah, it does kind of get the blood going.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真讨喜啊，木瓶倒地的声音，出租鞋喷雾的味道，让我热血沸腾。

yingyinNormal.en: So, I finally came upon a bus bench where I sat and removed one of my shirts and, fashioned it into a makeshift shoe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最终坐在一张公车站的长凳上脱掉了我的一件衣服用它做了一只临时的鞋。

yingyinNormal.en: Not a waterproof shoe. That is relevant to the next part of my story. The ankle-deep puddle of warm apple juice. Apple juice? Maybe, maybe not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这鞋不防水。这个细节和我接下来的故事大有关联。这个细节和我接下来的故事大有关联。那是一坑深及脚踝的"温热金黄苹果汁"。什么苹果汁？也许是，也许不是。

yingyinNormal.en: Why is there jelly on your shoe? I had a donuts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的鞋子上为什么会有果酱？我吃了甜甜圈。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't take advice from a man who threw his shoe at a crow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 千万别听一个用鞋子扔乌鸦的人的建议。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy Pig and Peppa are at Miss Rabbit's shoe shop. Hello, Miss Rabbit. Hello, Mummy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈和佩琪来到了兔小姐的鞋店。你好兔小姐。你好猪妈妈。

yingyinNormal.en: An Oxford is any formal shoe, with open lacing. This additional decorative piece is called broguing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有鞋带的都可称作牛津鞋，这种有额外装饰的叫做布洛克皮鞋。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, are you questioning my integrity as a scientist? If the lab room disposable shoe cover fits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打断下，你是在质疑我作为科学家的诚信吗？实验室的一次性鞋套合脚吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yeah, you shot yourself on your foot, you put your foot in your mouth, you put the shoe in the wrong foot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，你朝你的脚上开了一枪，你把脚放进自己嘴里[说错话]，你鞋子穿错脚了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 鞋子; 鞋状物; 穿鞋

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an outer covering for the human foot usually having a thick and somewhat stiff sole and heel and a lighter upper part
sense_info_list.zh: 鞋子; 鞋状物; 穿鞋

examination_example.sentence: The family's increasing poverty forced Dickens out of school at age 12 to work in Warren's Blacking Warehouse, a <highlight>shoe</highlight>-polish factory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个家庭越来越贫困，迫使狄更斯在12岁时辍学，在沃伦的鞋油工厂“黑仓库”工作。

examination_example.sentence: Act Your <highlight>Shoe</highlight> Size, Not Your Age

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an outer covering for the human foot usually having a thick and somewhat stiff sole and heel and a lighter upper part

examination_example.sentence_trans: 女人们穿着运动鞋去上班。

examination_example.sentence: Customers can bring <highlight>shoes</highlight> of any brand into an Adidas store to be shredded and turned into alternative fuels for energy creation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消费者可以把任何品牌的废旧鞋子带到阿迪达斯商店，经过粉碎处理后转化为创造能源的可替代燃料。

examination_example.sentence: It even offers a discount each time a customer brings in an old pair of <highlight>shoes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它甚至会在顾客每次带来旧鞋时提供折扣。

word_usage.usage:
shoe为可数名词，且多以复数形式出现。“一双鞋”用a pair of shoes表达。
示例：我不喜欢这些鞋，你能再给我拿一双吗?
误 I don't like these shoes. Will you show me another one?
正 I don't like these shoes. Will you show me another pair?

sense_info_list.en: an outer covering for the human foot usually having a thick and somewhat stiff sole and heel and a lighter upper part

examination_example.sentence: The goal was simple, to discover how the species adapted to the kind of heat that can literally melt the bottom of <highlight>shoes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目的很简单，就是要发现这个物种是如何适应那种可以融化鞋底的热度的。

word_usage.usage:
shoe为可数名词，且多以复数形式出现。“一双鞋”用a pair of shoes表达。
示例：我不喜欢这些鞋，你能再给我拿一双吗?
误 I don't like these shoes. Will you show me another one?
正 I don't like these shoes. Will you show me another pair?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I wonder if you could tell me how to find a place to have my <highlight>shoes</highlight> mended.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不知你能否告诉我怎样找个地方补鞋。

examination_example.sentence: First of all, you must wear <highlight>shoes</highlight> that cover your feet in the lab.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，在实验室里，你必须穿能盖住脚的鞋子。

examination_example.sentence: Firstly, please do remember to put on some comfortable <highlight>shoes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，请记得穿上舒适的鞋子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

word_family.mean: n. 鞋；形状似鞋子之物；桩靴；马蹄铁；马掌；车轮制动棒；插口；金属箍

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 运动鞋；运动休闲鞋；活动鞋

sense_info_list.en: an outer covering for the human foot usually having a thick and somewhat stiff sole and heel and a lighter upper part

examination_example.sentence: When we teenagers have problems in getting on well with parents, it's necessary to put ourselves in parents' <highlight>shoes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们青少年在与父母相处有问题时，有必要设身处地为父母着想。

examination_example.sentence: Tom often washes his sports <highlight>shoes</highlight> by himself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汤姆经常自己洗运动鞋。

examination_example.sentence: He spent the afternoon on the way and did not buy his <highlight>shoes</highlight> at last.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在路上花了一个下午的时间，最后没有买鞋。

word_usage.usage:
shoe为可数名词，且多以复数形式出现。“一双鞋”用a pair of shoes表达。
示例：我不喜欢这些鞋，你能再给我拿一双吗?
误 I don't like these shoes. Will you show me another one?
正 I don't like these shoes. Will you show me another pair?
